name: Kaspersky Virus Database
summary: Learn about .AVC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AVC files are typically named with a three-letter prefix followed by three digits which stand for file update number (e.g., base001.avc, base002.avc, etc.).

description: Update file used by Kaspersky Lab's Anti-Virus and Internet Security computer security software; stores antivirus definitions for the program; used for downloading protection information that keeps the software up-to-date.
